about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a passionate <1>Analyst-Developer</1> based in Quebec City, with expertise in building modern web applications. My journey in software development has taken me through various roles, from backend systems to full-stack solutions.
about.p2: Currently, I specialize in <1>Next.js</1>, <3>React</3>, <5>TypeScript</5>, and <7>Node.js</7>, with a strong focus on cloud deployment using AWS. I enjoy tackling complex problems and building solutions that make a real impact.
about.p3: Beyond coding, I've been a professional indoor soccer goalkeeper and enjoy tutoring fellow students in computer science. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with others.
